choiceresponse.p: Which criteria can you use to determine when to claim a message for another consumer?
choiceresponse.label: Choose one or more answers:

checkboxgroup.choice: The number of messages in a stream

div.p: Redis exposes consumer idle time, time since message delivery, and the message delivery count. These are all reasonable metrics to use to decide when to reassign a message. The total number of messages in a stream is irrelevant.
